title: Courageous Women: A Study on the Heroines of Biblical History
description: Courageous A Study on the Heroines of Biblical History is another volume in Stacy Mitch's popular Courageous series of Bible studies for women. An example is worth a thousand words. Using the stories of Sarah, Esther, Judith, the Blessed Mother, and other heroines of Scripture, Stacy Mitch helps her readers see how they can follow these examples in their daily lives. Divided into nine sections, this book is ideal for individual or group study.
author: Stacy Mitch
